subject: Pickyshop.com Order # {orderId} unpaid order
line1: Looks like your order still hasn't gotten paid.
line2: You can try the payment again by clicking on your name (in the upper right near to shopping bag) and entering in MyPickyshop/MyOrdersandReturns/TryPaymentAgain or via this link.
line3: If you want to change the payment method, for example in COD, just send an email to support@pickyshop.com.
